Nephroblastomatosis (Diffuse Hyperplastic Perilobar Nephroblastomatosis)
				                    The treatment of nephroblastomatosis depends on the following:         - Whether the child has abnormal groups of cells in one or both kidneys.    - Whether the child has Wilms tumor in one kidney and groups of abnormal cells in the other kidney.
